00010 void sintaxe( char *progname ){
00011         fprintf( stderr, "%s version " ANALYSERPXREAD_VERSION "\n", progname);
00012         fprintf( stderr, "%s reads a file with flows previously captured \n\
00013 by analyserpx_cap and prints it in text format. \n\
00014 \n\
00015 Usage:  %s [-h] [-d] [-s] file\n\
00016 where\n\
00017 -h      This message\n\
00018 -d      Prints the start data and time in a human readable format. \n\
00019         The end time is substituted by the flow duration (in miliseconds). \n\
00020 -s      Print protocol name instead of protocol ID\n\
00021 file    The file containing flows captured with analyserpx_cap\n\
00022 ", progname, progname  );
00023 }
00024 
00025 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00026     char flow_format = FORMAT_FLOW_DEFAULT;
00027     char proto_format = FORMAT_PROTO_DEFAULT;
00028 
00029     int c;      // option
00030     int entry_count = 0;
00031     flow_t *flow = (flow_t *) malloc(sizeof(flow_t));
00032     char buffer[1024];
00033     char *fileName = NULL;
00034 
00035     while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "hsdf:")) != -1){
00036         switch (c) {
00037         case 'd':
00038             flow_format = FORMAT_FLOW_DATE_DURATION;
00039             break;
00040         case 'f':
00041             fileName = optarg;
00042             break;
00043         case 's':
00044             proto_format = FORMAT_PROTO_NAME;
00045             break;
00046         case 'h':
00047             sintaxe( argv[0] );
00048             return( 0 );
00049             break;
00050         }
00051     }
00052 //     printf("default proto format = %d\n", proto_format );
00053 //     printf("default format = %d\n", flow_format );
00054 //     printf("optind=%d, argc=%d, argv[1]=%s, filename=%s\n", optind, argc, argv[1], fileName );
00055 
00056     //argc -= optind; argv += optind;
00057     if( fileName == NULL ) {
00058         if( argc > optind ){
00059                 fileName = argv[ optind ];
00060         } else {
00061                 sintaxe(argv[0]);
00062         }
00063     }
00064 
00065 //     if (argc == 1) {
00066 //      printf("\nENTER FILENAME\n");
00067 //      return 1;
00068 //     }
00069 //     fileName = argv[1];
00070 
00071     printFlowStruct( flow_format, buffer);
00072     printf("#%s\n", buffer);
00073 
00074     int i = 0;
00075     while ((flow = readFlowFromFile(flow, fileName, i++))) {
00076         entry_count++;
00077         flowToString(flow_format, proto_format, flow, buffer);
00078         fprintf( stdout, "%s\n", buffer);
00079     }
00080     fprintf( stderr, "#%d entries found\n", entry_count);
00081     exit(0);
00082 }
